subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Russ Smith scored 23 points and No. 4 Louisville overcame a sleepy start and rallied from an 8-point deficit in the second half of a 70-60 victory over visiting Western Kentucky (4-9).
snippet: Russ Smith scored 23 points and No. 4 Louisville overcame a sleepy start and rallied from an 8-point deficit in the second half of a 70-60 victory over visiting Western Kentucky (4-9).
